sources.name: Roine, Vlachos, Waldenström (2009) and US Historical Tables (2016)
sources.description:
Data published by

(a) All countries except United States: Roine, J., Vlachos, J., & Waldenström, D. (2007). What Determines Top Income Shares? Evidence from the Twentieth Century (No. 2007: 17). Stockholm University, Department of Economics.

(b) United States: United States. Office of Management and Budget. "Fiscal Year 2017," Historical Tables, Budget of the United States Government (February 9, 2016).
Data publisher's source

(a) Rousseau, Peter and Richard Sylla (2003), “Financial Systems, Economic Growth, and Globalization”. In Bordo, M., A. Taylor, and J. Williamson, eds., Globalization in Historical Perspective, Chicago: University of Chicago Press for the National Bureau of Economic Research.

(b) United States: United States. Office of Management and Budget. "Fiscal Year 2017," Historical Tables, Budget of the United States Government (February 9, 2016).
Link

(a) http://www.ifn.se/Wfiles/wp/wp721.pdf

(b) https://fraser.stlouisfed.org/scribd/?item_id=522154&filepath=/docs/publications/usbhist/BUDGET-2017-TAB.pdf
Retrieved 2016-10-18
